content.1: And Nadab and Abihu, the sons of Aaron, took either of them his censer, and put fire therein, and put incense thereon, and offered strange fire before the
content.2: And there went out fire from the
content.3: Then Moses said unto Aaron, This
content.4: And Moses called Mishael and Elzaphan, the sons of Uzziel the uncle of Aaron, and said unto them, Come near, carry your brethren from before the sanctuary out of the camp.
content.5: So they went near, and carried them in their coats out of the camp; as Moses had said.
content.6: And Moses said unto Aaron, and unto Eleazar and unto Ithamar, his sons, Uncover not your heads, neither rend your clothes; lest ye die, and lest wrath come upon all the people: but let your brethren, the whole house of Israel, bewail the burning which the
content.7: And ye shall not go out from the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, lest ye die: for the anointing oil of the
content.9: Do not drink wine nor strong drink, thou, nor thy sons with thee, when ye go into the tabernacle of the congregation, lest ye die:
content.10: And that ye may put difference between holy and unholy, and between unclean and clean;
content.11: And that ye may teach the children of Israel all the statutes which the
content.12: And Moses spake unto Aaron, and unto Eleazar and unto Ithamar, his sons that were left, Take the meat offering that remaineth of the offerings of the
content.13: And ye shall eat it in the holy place, because it
content.14: And the wave breast and heave shoulder shall ye eat in a clean place; thou, and thy sons, and thy daughters with thee: for
content.15: The heave shoulder and the wave breast shall they bring with the offerings made by fire of the fat, to wave
content.16: And Moses diligently sought the goat of the sin offering, and, behold, it was burnt: and he was angry with Eleazar and Ithamar, the sons of Aaron
content.17: Wherefore have ye not eaten the sin offering in the holy place, seeing it
content.18: Behold, the blood of it was not brought in within the holy
content.19: And Aaron said unto Moses, Behold, this day have they offered their sin offering and their burnt offering before the
